{"step_by_step_thinking": "Document [0] shows that 2-methoxyestradiol (2ME) has been shown to be a potent inhibitor of cell growth and a strong anti-angiogenic substance. This suggests that the combination of 2ME with chemotherapeutics may offer a new clinically relevant treatment regimen for hormone-dependent cancer.
